The '''Exotic Share Bundle''' is available as part of the [[Adventurer's Special Bundle]], which can be purchased in the [[Gift Shop]] section in the Shop at limited times.

One of the following can be selected upon using this item:
{{Card|Agnidus Agate Fragment|1}}{{Card|Varunada Lazurite Fragment|1}}{{Card|Vajrada Amethyst Fragment|1}}{{Card|Vayuda Turquoise Fragment|1}}{{Card|Shivada Jade Fragment|1}}{{Card|Prithiva Topaz Fragment|1}}
